snippet: The shooting, the third by the New York police in three days, happened after the man lunged at the officers with a pair of scissors, the police said.
abstract: Two uniformed New York City police officers shoot and kill Broadie Osbourne in a Brooklyn apartment after he lunges at the officers with a pair of scissors; officers were responding to a call about woman being stabbed; it is third shooting by New York police in three days.
lead_paragraph: The shooting, the third by the New York police in three days, happened after the man lunged at the officers with a pair of scissors, the police said.

headline.main: Two Police Officers Shoot and Kill a Brooklyn Man
headline.print_headline: Two Police Officers Shoot and Kill a Brooklyn Man
